meanings.sent1: In the hospital, the nonpsychiatrists assist the doctors with paperwork.
meanings.sent2: The nonpsychiatrists in the clinic handle administrative tasks efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The nonpsychiatrists organized a surprise party for the psychiatrists.
meanings.sent4: Among the sea of white coats, the nonpsychiatrists stood out with their colorful scrubs.
meanings.sent5: The nonpsychiatrists are essential members of the healthcare team.

meanings.definition: Those who do not practice psychiatry.
meanings.sent1: Nonpsychiatrists often work closely with psychiatrists to provide holistic care.
meanings.sent2: The conference room was filled with nonpsychiatrists discussing new treatment approaches.
meanings.sent3: The nonpsychiatrists jokingly referred to themselves as 'mind detectives'.
meanings.sent4: In a world of psychiatrists, the nonpsychiatrists were the unsung heroes.
meanings.sent5: The nonpsychiatrists bring a fresh perspective to mental health care.
